description: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this CE Mission Statement : To build India's most loved fashion brand by offering differentiated customer experience. Relevance : - Customer experience has been acknowledged as the core driver of Myntra's growth and more so going forward as we become an engagement platform rather than just a fashion retailer. CE is central to shaping the overall company direction by interacting with ALL departments (category, catalog, supply chain, tech.) to incubate and drive differentiation projects, and drive improvement initiatives - Illustrative projects that the team is working on setting up a fashion services marketplace, setting up an internal MR / Voice of Customer service line, driving differentiation projects like scheduled deliveries / alterations, operational improvements at the call center Team : - Team is a mix of people to mirror the overall org-so it has people from tech (product managers), usablity experts, fashion and retail professionals, supply chain experts and a pool of Business Analysts who provide generalist problem solving and project management skills. We have an extremely strong team-our Business Analysts are all from BCGand our CE team is headed by an ex-McKinsey Associate Partner. What we are looking for : - First and foremost,problem solving ability- they will be dealing with a very ambiguous set of problems (eg, setting up fashion services marketplace), Very action oriented (we will have a bunch of things that keep coming-up taking them to closure is a critical skill) Strong project management skills and communication / influencing skills. - Tech orientation is a must, past background in tech is not mandatory but preferred. Career progression : - We see this as a central talent pool which we are developing. One will get exposure to all aspects of the business in this role, and after 1.5 years or so, we expect (and will actively support) our BAs to move into different functions OR start playing leadership roles the businesses that are being incubated by this team. This team has great visibility internally and therefore the movement opportunities will be plentiful. Responsibilities : - Define business problems for CE and define key metrics and indicators for measurement - Conduct analysis for assigned business problem by collecting data from all internal and external sources and perform analysis to get answers to business questions. - Put together excel models for business scenario analysis - Conduct Market research for an assigned topic to dig out relevant data and analytics - Deeper analysis of consumer behaviors & trends, by reviewing the internal & external data All roles require : - Strong communication skills (verbal & written) - Strong Analytical Skills and Process Orientation - The ability to thrive in a fast-paced, start-up environment Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Internet / Ecommerce Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Operations Role:Business/EDP Analyst Keyskills Data Analytics Customer Experience Business Analysis Project Management Market Research Call Center Customer Service Process Orientation Strong Communication Skills Supply Chain Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:MBA/PGDM - Any Specialization Company Profile: Myntra Designs Pvt. Ltd. Introduction Myntra is a one stop shop for all your fashion and lifestyle needs. Being India's largest e-commerce store for fashion and lifestyle products, Myntra aims at providing a hassle free and enjoyable shopping experience to shoppers across the country with the widest range of brands and products on its portal. The brand is making a conscious effort to bring the power of fashion to shoppers with an array of the latest and trendiest products available in the country. Value Proposition Myntra's value proposition revolves around giving consumers the power and ease of purchasing fashion and lifestyle products online. Offerings such as the largest in-season product catalogue, 100% authentic products, cash on delivery, EMI facility and 30 day return policy make Myntra, the preferred shopping destination in the country. To make online shopping easier for you, a dedicated customer connect team is on standby to answer your queries 24x7. Brands Myntra understands its shoppers' needs and caters to them with choice of apparel, accessories, cosmetics and footwear from over 500 leading Indian and international brands. Prominent brands include Adidas, Nike, Puma, Catwalk, Inc 5, United Colors of Benetton, FCUK, Timberland, Avirate, FabIndia and Biba to name a few. You can also shop from some recently introduced labels such as - Roadster, Sher Singh, Dressberry, Kook N Keech and ETC. Recognitions - Awarded 'Fashion eRetailer of the Year 2013' by Franchise India - Indian eRetail Awards - Awarded 'Best E-commerce Website for 2012' by IAMAI - India Digital Awards - Awarded 'Images Most Admired Retailer of the Year: Non-Store Retail' for 2012 by Images Group - Awarded 'Best E-commerce Partner of the year 2011-12' by Puma India Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

description: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Job Description for Member Technical - Wire Harness & Fabrication Position Introduction: Rossell Techsys is the Aerospace and Defence (A&D) Division of Rossell India Limited (www.rossellindia.com). Rossell Techsys is based out of the technology hub of India - Bangalore.Rossell Techsys employs a little under 100 staff members and has aggressive growth plans to meet the emerging challenges of the Indian Aerospace and Defence Industry, including potential offset business in India. Rossell Techsys has four core competency areas - Custom embedded systems product development, Test solution design and development including test jigs, rigs, and simulators, Wire harness engineering & looming and Product Support Services. Rossell Techsys is AS9100 Rev C and IS0 9001, 14001(EMS), 27001(ISMS) certified organisation. Rossell Techsys is a CEMILAC approved design house. Positions: This position is for Member - Staff level as an individual contributor with 2 to 10 years of experience. Qualifications and Credentials: Candidates must be at least Diploma in Electronics and Electrical,with excellent academic credentials, from premier educational institutes. Given the kind of vision that Rossell TechSys has set for itself, candidates must not only be worthy professionals, but fundamentally, mature in all aspects of their personality, be able to work in an invigorating, team oriented, and global engineering environment. A belief of 'competing with one's own self' would be good to start with. Candidates with prior experience in aviation and defense domain would be given preference. Candidate who satisfies at least a part of the technical requirements and most of the personality requirements would be exciting candidates to meet with. Technical Requirements: Mandatory / Primary Skills Hands on experience in wiring harness fabrication with knowledge in various cable finishing tools and techniques such as crimp, solder, splicing, potting, sleeving, printing, Connectorisation, etc Knowledge of wire harness components and manufacturing process used in the cable industry is a must. Experience in Aircraft Looms and RF cables will be a plus. Knowledge on Wire Harness In process Inspection stages IPC/WHMA-620 A trained candidate will be a huge plus. Must have worked in an ISO 9001-2008 QMS environment. Experience with AS9100B will be a huge plus. As at this time, we are not working in shifts, however, over time, this position entails working in shifts. Secondary Skills Domain skills in the Aviation and Defense sector. Mechanical CAD design experience will be a huge plus. A fearless attitude to engineering related work. Yet having the good use of common sense and knowing when to take the risk and when not to. Personality Requirements: Candidate must have good communication skills Must have a positive attitude and display maturity in understanding that organizational goals and objectives take precedence to individual goals and objectives. Compensation: Selected Candidates shall be offered benchmark compensation packages and rewards for high performance. Joining Time: Selected Candidates are expected to join within 2 to 4 weeks. References: Selected Candidates will be required to provide a minimum of 2 references on employment. Any large scale educational change requires significant and sustained effort over many decades and can only be achieved through working at multiple levels as well as on several areas simultaneously. The Foundation today works in 8 states and has institutes that are located at Karnataka (Bangalore, Yadgir, Mandya and Gulbarga), Rajasthan (Jaipur, Sirohi, Tonk, Barmer and Rajsamand), Uttarakhand (Dehradun, Uttarkashi, Udham Singh Nagar and Almora), Bihar (Patna), Chhattisgarh (Raipur and Dhamtari), Madhya Pradesh (Bhopal) and Puducherry. At many of the District Institutes, schools have been established for the specific purpose of demonstration. These schools provide quality free education to the local community, at costs and constraints similar to that of rural government schools. Over the next few years, the Foundation plans to have about 50 District Institutes, 30 schools and over 4000 employees. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

description: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Looking for a job or career at a fast-growing and highly impactful industry to empower people and society? Are you looking for an opportunity to take ownership and drive results? Look no further because Logistimo is the place for you! Logistimo pioneers mobile and web supply chain technology for rural emerging markets across Healthcare, Consumer goods, Agricultural goods, Waste management and Humanitarian action. Customers include agencies of the UN, Ministries of Health of different countries, Public Health Units, Retailers, Distributors, Transporters, Wholesalers and Producers seeking deeper integration of the first- and last-mile of their value chains. From Asia to Africa, at Logistimo, they apply technology to improve supply chain performance, create greater transparency, decrease operating costs and provide clients with a competitive advantage. Based in Bangalore, Logistimo needs a capable and motivated Product Support Specialist to help provide the best support on the Logistimo product for all its users. Key skills required include an ability to manage product issues or requests raised at various levels and integrate them to the product pipeline in coordination with the engineering team. Another key aspect of the role is to provide all levels of customer support to users including prioritizing escalations, new feature launches, creating easy reference guides/FAQ, user issue analysis etc. Helping to derive client insights and drive process transformation, this role presents a unique opportunity to make a tangible difference in rural healthcare, agriculture, disaster response and beyond. Target salary range is highly competitive (7 - 12L CTC) and will be based on previous experience, subject to customary increases on joining.  This is not a shift based role; you will be working regular office hours (which will be same as rest of Logistimo team). Detailed Responsibilities: Investigate, diagnose and respond to technical questions and issues received from customers  Provide thorough product support across all levels (large technical issues and granular - device related issues)  Promptly answer support related emails , phone calls and other communications  Log reported bugs to the engineering team via bug reporting platforms  Partner with the engineering team to ensure filed bug fixes are completed within the stipulated time frame  Support pilot deployments across new regions with new customers; provide direct and ongoing user support; provide onsite training for users; monitor and report support data across multiple metrics  Gather, consolidate and present data periodically from the customer request tools to internal stakeholders  Design, test and implement improvements in the tools and processes deployed by the customer success team in partnership with multiple stakeholders  Create and update the technical support 'FAQ library' periodically, in collaboration with the internal communications team  Keep abreast of new features and product enhancements Salary:INR 7,00,000 - 12,00,000 P.A. description: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Inside sales specialist and lead generation Specialist jobs in leading Company. For more info Call or whatsapp at 9611209386 This is an opportunity for you to use your incredible sales skills to move to the head of the pack. You will be working with small to medium size businesses in the U.S in a way that will lead to a closed sale. Your business acumen, research, ability to show Return on Investment and closing skills will win the day. Eligibility Graduates fresher/Experience Undergraduate with Inside sales or telesales Experience for one year Shifts and off : Day /US shift Work location : BTM/Yemulur Salary : up to 10 Lakh (depends upon relevant experience) Company Description Company is part of a leader in connected vehicle technologies, with solutions for fleet management, usage-based insurance and road usage charge programs in use throughout North America, South America, Europe and India. It is one of the fastest growing and most dynamic sales centers in all of Bangalore! Company is blowing away the competition with our leading edge solutions for fleet tracking, and our reps are making a great living doing it. Some of our team members are among the highest paid in Bangalore. What We Offer Be part of one of the best inside sales teams in Bangalore Highly dynamic sales environment where the Bangalore team is outselling the competition that uses inside sales groups in the US. Go India!! Best-in-industry sales compensation that includes not only lucrative fixed and variable components, but also spot bonuses and contests for trips, vacations, cash, and more Top sales reps are pulling in over 40 Lakhs per annum! Medical insurance - company paid Pick-up and drop off transportation to most locations in Bangalore - company paid All meals provided - company paid What we are looking for? We are looking for a talented and competitive Inside Sales Representative that thrives in a quick sales cycle environment. The successful candidate will play a fundamental role in achieving our ambitious customer acquisition and revenue growth objectives. You must be comfortable making dozens of calls per day, working with channel partners, generating interest, qualifying prospects and closing sales. What do inside sales executives do? Inside sales are the sale of products or services by sales personnel who reach customers by phone or online, rather than traveling to meet them face-to-face. Inside relies on the phone, emails and the internet to reach customers Responsibilities Source new sales opportunities through inbound lead follow-up and outbound cold calls and emails Understand customer needs and requirements Route qualified opportunities to the appropriate sales executives for further development and closure Close sales and achieve quarterly quotas Research accounts, identify key players and generate interest Maintain and expand your database of prospects within your assigned territory Team with channel partners to build pipeline and close deals Perform effective online demos to prospects Career opportunities in Inside sales There are many reasons why people choose a career in sales. From unlimited income to the autonomy that many sales careers offer, sales careers certainly have a lot to offer. With the Inside Sales industry growing due to an increasing number of employers recognizing the many benefits of employing inside reps, choosing a career in Inside Sales have become a topic of consideration for many job hunters. If you are actively seeking a sales position and have been wondering if you should pursue an Inside Sales position, here are a few factors that may sway you towards considering moving inside. A Dynamic, High-Energy Work Atmosphere High Income and Awards Being able to work from anywhere in the world is not something that all those in the Inside Sales industry can enjoy but those that can often claim this factor as the most appealing thing about their positions. Required Skills Ability to engage and build long term relationship with prospects Clear and concise verbal communication skills appropriate to the U.S and U.K prospects Working knowledge of Salesforce.com and MS Office would be an added advantage Proven ability to identify and develop new sales opportunities. Knowledge of sales and marketing including basic selling principles and solution selling methods; should be able to discover prospects pain points by using probing techniques and effectively address each one of them. Ability to quickly research a prospect company and tailor your presentation to their specific needs and close the sale. Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales quotas A disciplined approach to managing your territories and your sales efforts on a daily basis Passion for Inside sales; successful candidates are self-driven, energetic, confident and motivated with the ability to think on your feet Strong judgment and decision making skills Regards CA Shwetha Recruitment consultant-ITES/BPO IKYA Human capital solutions Bangalore Ikya Human Capital Solutions, A Unit of Quess corp, 2nd floor, Raheja Arcade, Beside Punjab grill, Koramangala, Bangalore Landmark: Opposite to Forum mall, Koramangala Contact details Mob: 9611209386 Email : shwetha.ca@ikyaglobal.com â€ƒ Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: BPO / Call Centre / ITES Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Voice Role:Associate/Senior Associate -(NonTechnical) Keyskills Marketing Inside Sales Solution Selling Lead Generation Telesales Cold Calling Outbound Inbound Customer Acquisition Telematics selling Product Software sales outbound calls cold call pre sales post sales cross selling Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Company Profile: Ikya Human Capital Solutions Pvt Ltd IKYA Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

description: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Overview: Datamar India is looking for experienced and skilled Admin, HR & Finance Controller who can coordinate office operations and procedures, in order to ensure organizational effectiveness, efficiency and safety. The ideal candidate will be experienced in handling a wide range of administrative and executive support related tasks and will be able to work independently with little or no supervision. This person must be exceedingly well organized, flexible and enjoy the administrative challenges of supporting an office of diverse people. Datamar India is a data and market intelligence provision company working in the maritime and foreign trade sector with a focus on the East Coast of South America. The company partners with major transport companies such as ship and port operators to gather, process and distribute data that helps organizations make decisions on strategic, commercial and operational matters. Responsibilities: Admin, HR & Finance Controller will be responsible for overseeing the full range of maintaining and enhancing the organizations Administration, Finance and Human Resources by planning, implementing, and evaluating employee relations and human resources policies, programs and practices. Admin, HR & Finance Controller will also be part of the senior management team and will have the opportunity to bring an HR and Administrative perspective to the organisation. Administration: Oversee office in maintaining files and centralized databases Manage office facilities administration Serves as the go-to for office inquiries and conflicts Plan and coordinate administrative procedures and systems and devise ways to streamline processes Manage schedules and deadlines Monitor inventory of office supplies and the purchasing of new material with attention to budgetary constrains Organise and supervise other office activities Human Resources: Be the first point of contact for all HR-related queries Administer HR-related documentation, such as contracts of employment Ensure the relevant HR database is up to date, accurate and complies with legislation Plan, implements, and manages the human resources function, including recruiting, employee relations, regulatory compliances, benefits, staff developments, and employee communications Investigates employee relations issues such as disciplinary and grievances Effectively communicate HR policies, procedures, programs and laws organization wide Finance: Achieves financial objectives by anticipating requirements; submitting information for budget preparation; scheduling expenditures; monitoring costs; analysing variances. Monitor cost and expenses, maintenance activities and tradespersons Responsible for Capital & Expense budget Tracking budget expenses Manage day to day finances, make payments to vendors and service providers. Coordinate with outsourced accountancy service, in regards to payroll management, and other financial matters. Qualifications and Experience: Bachelors degree and a minimum of five years of related experience Strong working knowledge of and experience in Indian labour law and local regulations Proven experience as administration management, supervisory, budgeting skills Outstanding communication skills, both verbal and written Proven ability to establish priorities and meet deadlines Outstanding organizational skills; the ability to multi-task and make decisions under pressure In-depth understanding of office management procedures and departmental and legal policies Familiarity with financial and facilities management principles Proficient in MS Office An analytical mind with problem-solving skills A team player with leadership skills This is a challenging opportunity for a dedicated and highly motivated professional. If you would like to join this dynamic team, please send your CV to info@datamar.com.br Job Location Hennur, Bangalore Position Type: Full-Time/Regular (Monday Saturday) Salary: INR 400,000 - 500,000 Salary:INR 4,00,000 - 5,00,000 P.A Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: HR , Recruitment , Administration , IR Role Category:HR/ Recruitment / IR Role:HR Executive Keyskills Administration Management HR Policies Finance Control Recruitment Budgeting Skills Executive Support Employee Relations Foreign Trade Budget Preparation MS Office Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Company Profile: Datamar Business Intelligence Pvt Ltd Datamar India is a data and market intelligence provision company working in the maritime and foreign trade sector with a focus on the East Coast of South America. The company partners with major transport companies such as ship and port operators to gather, process and distribute data that helps organizations make decisions on strategic, commercial and operational matters. MD Pharmacology Freshers only Apply  Job Location- Kolkota/Bangalore Job Designation- Scientific project manager Job Description. Participate in set up, oversight and follow-up of assigned clinical studies/medical projects, ensuring that the studies are carried out in accordance with all relevant processes and procedures Assist relationships and advance the scientific credibility of the Company with established and emerging Regional/National Opinion Leaders (OL). Respond to requests for scientific/medical information and provide key scientific information updates to Regional and National OLs, as appropriate. Develop/maintain key scientific knowledge that enable credible dissemination of scientific information, informed scientific dialogue with physicians/OLs and development of professional working relationships Ensure compliance with all applicable national laws & regulations, guidelines, codes of conduct, Abbotts policies & procedures, and accepted standards of best practice PRIMARY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES - EXAMPLES KEY CUSTOMERS Provide scientific and technical support for, and help maintain professional and credible relationships with, key OLs/ academic centres to ensure access to current medical/scientific information on the products/areas of therapeutic interest. Assist in initiation, oversight and follow up of assigned clinical studies/medical projects initiated within the relevant TA (e.g. post marketing clinical activities such as registry/database projects, epidemiological surveys, post-authorization studies (phase IV), IIS projects, etc.). Note: all activities to comply with applicable local laws, guidelines, codes of practice, SOPs, and GPRD SOPs. Maintain contacts with physicians and OLs of the assigned geographic area in order to satisfy their needs for scientific knowledge in the therapeutic area and, where requested, Abbott drugs/products the SPM carries responsibility for. Deliver credible presentations on scientific matters to physicians, individually or in groups (meetings, clinical sessions, etc.), where requested. Internal Clinical Research Manager Clinical Operations Manager Medical Advisers/Managers Marketing department of the therapeutic area Sales organization of the geographic area of responsibility. Administrative personnel of the Medical Department and of the Business Unit. Pharmacovigilance Unit of the Affiliate. Medical Information Service. Develop awareness and understanding of competitor issues/intelligence for example, product strategies, studies, commercial messages, positioning, etc and communicate, where appropriate, within the Company. External Healthcare personnel of the medical area in which the SPM performs his or her functions (physicians, nurses, pharmacists) Participating Research Investigators Opinion leaders Institutions and Scientific or Medical Societies Attend relevant Scientific Societies meetings/Conferences, and develop summaries of key messages for use within the Company such as key areas of scientific/company interest, new trends in diagnosis, monitoring & treatments in the TA, etc. AUTHORITY / REPORTING LINES LOCATION Upon request, assist physicians appropriately direct requests for access to Company products on a named patient or compassionate use basis, subject to all applicable legal and regulatory requirements Support sales/marketing/internal team areas to develop their scientific and technical expertise through the delivery of scientific update presentations. Provide KOLs & internal medical/clinical teams with scientific/technical support for publications of scientific/ medical interest. Ensure up to date knowledge of products uses and external data. Perform administrative duties in a timely manner as assigned. Reports to a Medical Manager (or equivalent) of an assigned Therapeutic Area Typically this function is field (remote to office) based REQUIRED CORE COMPETENCIES / ATTRIBUTES - EXAMPLES REQUIRED MEDICAL KNOWLEDGE AREAS Adaptability Maintains effectiveness when experiencing major changes in work tasks or the work environment; adjusts effectively to work within new work structures, processes, requirements, or cultures. Considers change or new situations as opportunities for learning and growth. Perseveres when encountering adversity. When confronted with a problem or crisis, considers alternatives and then takes timely action. Effectively prioritizes work tasks. Initiative Takes prompt action to accomplish objectives; is proactive. Maintains a strong focus on internal and/or external customers. Continuously monitors relevant information, key issues and/or trends. Proactively seeks feedback and adapts behavior to improve performance. Demonstrates a willingness to learn new aspects of the business. Solid knowledge of pharmaceutical industry Knowledge of the scientific methods applied to clinical research and the current legislative/regulatory controls. Keen interest in developing and maintaining expert knowledge for assigned therapeutic area/product and in medical research in general REQUIRED PERSONAL / TECHNICAL SKILLS Innovation Generates innovative solutions in work situations; tries different and novel ways to deal with work problems and opportunities. Uses best practice and benchmark data to increase organizational performance. Identifies opportunities to improve efficiencies and red uce costs. Integrity Firmly adheres to codes of conduct and ethical principles. Exhibits honesty. Presents information accurately and completely. Keeps commitments to work colleagues and customers. Acknowledges and responds constructively to failure and mistakes. Team work / collaboration Works effectively and cooperatively with others; establishes and maintains good working relationships with internal and external partners to facilitate the accomplishment of work goals. Helps others achieve shared goals. Demonstrates a willingness to listen without interrupting. Open to diverse and different ideas. description: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Overview: As we continue to expand our artificial intelligence platform, Amelia, we are looking for NLP experts to join our development team. We need great scientists who also are great coders. Our scientists tackle the big challenges in deep language understanding and are passionate about writing sustainable code to implement advanced ideas. Whether from published research or their own approaches, our scientists identify and integrate the best science available all to create the best new NLP capability possible. We are looking for a hands-on scientist and developer ready to tackle the big challenges in deep language understanding. With an extensive existing customer base and a market-leading position in help desk automation, your work will go into production as soon as it shows measurable improvement over current methods. We think long term, while putting our research into practice on a rational schedule. Responsibilities: The ideal candidate will have both a research and development background. Having a history of peer-reviewed scientific publications in NLP is a plus. We have interest in candidates with a machine learning background and approach to NLP. We are also interested in candidates with a rule-based NLP background and knowledge of linguistic semantics. We have interest in candidates with experience in many portions of the NLP pipeline, including parsing, word sense disambiguation, knowledge extraction, question answering and language generation. Open source development experience is a plus. Ability to code in Java is required. You will lead an area of development of the pipeline, guiding and mentoring junior developers, working with the leads of the other areas of the pipeline and the lead scientist to create and deploy new capabilities in language understanding. You should be passionate about writing good and sustainable code to implement your advanced ideas. You will be expected to identify and integrate the best science available, whether from published research or your own approach. You will work with test and analysis engineers to prove your ideas against objective and measurable tests of capability. Each day you will be expected to move as needed between designing scientific approaches and architecture, writing or contributing to scientific publications, mentoring, and development in Java, all in the service of creating the best new NLP capability possible. Good scientists must also be good communicators, able to explain and justify complex ideas to junior developers and senior management, both verbally and in writing. You should be comfortable defining delivery schedules and metrics for performance assessment and meeting your targets. First and foremost we need great scientists who also are great coders. A mature coder should be able to learn a new framework quickly, so experience with each of the items below just helps us understand your implementation experience, but each is desirable. o -Development tools such as Maven, Jenkins, Ant, Eclipse o -Comfortable on Apple or Linux OSes o -Java Spring, Guava, JDBC, Tomcat, JUnit Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Computer Science from IIT/ IISc/ NITs/ Bits/ DCE/ ITBHU/ Guindy / Top US universities 1-3 Years Experience in Machine Learning and NLP Salary:INR 12,00,000 - 22,00,000 P.A Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills Machine Learning nlp natural language processing Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Computers PG:Post Graduation Not Required, M.Tech - Computers Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: IPsoft Global Services Private Limited About Company ABOUT IPSOFT IPsoft is a global, industry-leading managed services company offering a complete solution to enterprise customers for outsourcing global IT operations. We offer a full range of managed services to our clients, from management at the individual component, device and network level to the analysis, design and management of complex business processes. IPsoft's unique (and proprietary) automation technology remediates more than half of the detected exceptions in our managed client environments. We manage our customers' systems through our worldwide Network Operations Centers located in New York City (HQ), London, Amsterdam and Bangalore. IPsoft has been solidly profitable since its inception as a company in 1998, and has roughly doubled its gross revenues for four straight years; we are on a trajectory to continue this rapid growth pace, meaning that you will have an opportunity to grow with the company. CULTURE IPsoft is committed to helping our employees develop their full potential in both business and technical spheres, and it is our policy to recognize excellent performance by promoting from within. IPsoft is a fast-paced, energetic and fun place to work. We're changing the way managed services are delivered to customers, and we're looking for people who want to make a difference. The best evidence that IPsoft is a good place to work? People come to work here and stay. If you come to work at IPsoft, you'll be working with cutting-edge technologies and the bright, driven people who develop them. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

description: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Excellent Opportunity for young marketing specialist to work for TOP Notch/ Fastest Growing Healthcare Organization.  Company Name : Apollo Sugar Clinics Ltd Location : Chennai Role : Marketing Executive  CTC ; Market Driven + Company Benefits Job Role: Doing Field Marketing Activities to increase the footfall at Clinical Units. Responsible to do tie-ups, Retails Marketing, Events, RWA Tie-up, and other activities to appeal Diabetes Patients to increase footfall at Clinical Units to increase the consultations. Doing Catchment area analysis, Market mapping, BTL / ATL activities Responsible to drive the diabetes detection drives by screening diabetes patients as per standard process Should be good in computers / Data management/ follow-up to provide services to patients/ customers Increase the brand visibility in 5-10 kms of vicinity of clinical units Recommended and promoting company packages and services for the revenue growth Salary:INR 2,00,000 - 3,00,000 P.A. Other Company Benefits Industry: Medical / Healthcare / Hospitals Functional Area: Marketing , Advertising , MR , PR , Media Planning Role Category:Advertising Role:Events/Promotion Executive Keyskills marketing footfall camps flyers BTL ATl event RWA jogger park social clubs Event Marketing branding promotion below the line above the line field marketing catchment area road shows Desired Candidate Profile Graduates / MBA (Sales & Marketing) Experience in Marketing (BTL Activities & Marketing Events)Preferred from Healthcare/ Retail/ Retail HealthcareMust have a BIKE & VALID Driving LicenseField Marketing experience should be of 2 YearsArea KnowledgePlease call me 8500082192 or 8125804444 Company Profile: Apollo Sugar Clinics Limited Make a Career. Join Apollo Sugar India! Apollo Sugar Clinics is an innovative, single specialty diabetes and endocrine healthcare service provider, formed as a collaboration between Apollo Hospitals Group and Sanofi (Global Pharma MNC). Apollo Sugar believes that human capital is the key to the success of our organization. We have built a culture of collaboration between teams that ensures growth of individuals and the organization. Our work environment drives innovation and passion towards patient service. We recruit & engage the best talent pool towards fulfillment of our core objectives - compassion and care of our patients. With the expertise and knowledge of our international partners, we bring global standards, in the field of single specialty clinics. Apollo Sugar is an equal opportunity employer and promotes diversity in our workforce. If you are compassionate with a flair for service excellence that you think can provide healing touch to improve the lives of people around you, Apollo Sugar is the place for you. Join our team to leverage career opportunities and achieve long term success. Our talent pool comprises of specialists in Medical Services, Marketing, Finance, HR, IT, Operations & Quality domain. In our clinics operation, we endeavor to impart quality experience to our multi-disciplinary care specialists comprising Endocrinologists, Diabetologists, Operations Incharges, Patient Care Facilitators, Diabetes Specialist Nurses, Dieticians, Diabetic Educators, and Sales & Marketing lead's with meaningful assignments to enhance their skills and expertise at par with global standards. To know more about your career options, connect with Apollo Sugar HR Partners and discover how successful you can be with us. More About Apollo Sugar (read more at www.apollosugar.com) India is home to over 65 million diabetics and more than 50 million pre-diabetics. More than 30 million Indians are unknown diabetics (not yet diagnosed but afflicted). The need of the hour is to address this endemic with a dedicated, comprehensive model of care - Apollo Sugar Clinics is the answer. Apollo Sugar (An Apollo Group Company) is an innovative care delivery business focused on providing assured care for Diabetics. With 30 years of the Apollo group's heritage and quality healthcare delivery behind it, Apollo Sugar was founded on the vision to make diabetes disease free. We are building the largest pan-India single specialty clinics model for Diabetes. Our vision is 'disease-free diabetes' and our mission is to provide proven and comprehensive care to the diabetic being cared for, and not just the disorder - to keep co-morbidities or related complications of the heart, kidneys, eyes, nerves, feet at bay. We successfully deliver robust patient outcomes by staffing each Sugar clinic with best in class multi-disciplinary care teams of doctors, dieticians, trained diabetes specific nurses and counselors, backed with proven treatment protocols and lifestyle management interventions to enable our customers to keep their Diabetes in good control and live a disease free lifestyle. We currently have 35+ Apollo Sugar clinics that are operational pan India across major cities, and are fast scaling up to our footprint to help provide proven, quality care for millions of more diabetic patients across India. description: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Role purpose : The 1FBSSPL DevOps Engineer (DOE) will manage and maintain software development systems, java-based application servers, and apache web servers. Reports to: Senior General Manager (IT Head - India) Working Hours: 2:00pm 11:00pm Reported by: Nil (Individual Contributor Role) Job Overview : The 1FBSSPL DevOps Engineer (DOE) will manage and maintain software development systems, java-based application servers, and apache web servers. The DevOps Engineer will assist in the design of robust java-based application architectures that use Weblogic, TIBCO BusinessWorks, F5 network devices, and apache web servers. The DOE will work to improve the operation and reliability of software development systems and application servers through automated monitoring and automation of common tasks. Essential Functions and Responsibilities : Build new software development systems and upgrade and patch existing systems. Act as liaison between software development groups and the Operations group to resolve issues with system configuration and behavior. Configure, patch, and maintain Linux-based application servers and other development servers. Work closely with U.S. based software development teams and Operations personnel to insure development environments are correctly configured. Be quick to recognize tasks which can be automated and then automate them to reduce manual effort and improve repeatability. Conduct performance and fault analysis on applications with the assistance of software developers. Deploy web applications in a clustered and load balanced N-Tier infrastructure Write and maintain documentation involving job related functions. Job Requirements : Minimum 5 years of total relevant experience. Three years of experience in a previous DevOps role working with UNIX/linux servers and with java applications on Weblogic application servers. Experience writing complex shell scripts. Weblogic Java Application Server administration and tuning experience. Expert level understanding of networking/distributed computing concepts and client/server applications Linux administration experience (e.g. Ubuntu, RedHat/CentOS) with a focus on web (Apache) and Ansible would be a plus. Experience with Nagios, writing Nagios Scripts Understanding of protocols and technologies like HTTP, SSL, LDAP, JDBC, Servlet/JSP, HTML, XML Understand application clustering/load balancing concepts and technologies Excellent verbal and written communications skills in English are required. Ability to handle change and a self-starting attitude are required. Ability to work independently and also coordinate with others and to prioritize projects as well as combining research and expertise to assist organization.
